QuestData.Title: Checking In
QuestData.Description: When the trolls came, they brought their mercenary... friends with them. I saw them go past us, to the fishing camp in the northwest. My cousin, a healer, lives there - can you check in with him and make sure he and his village are well?
QuestData.LogDescription: Check on Sage Liao at the Zaochin Strand in Kun-Lai Summit.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh... My cousin is wise to be worried... I am not well...
